name: part_007
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】猫又おかゆ 2nd Live ＂ぺるそにゃ～りすぺくと＂ 【 #おかゆセカンド 】 [NM7_uUOAOlI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Nekomata Okayu performs 'Palo Santo' on stage.
MC section where Okayu talks to the audience and encourages them to sing along.

subtitles.original: 空模様のように
subtitles.english: Like the look of the sky

subtitles.original: 僕の色じゃなくても
subtitles.english: Even if it's not my color

subtitles.original: 素敵に着こなせるよ
subtitles.english: I can wear it beautifully

subtitles.original: 君の視界の僕は
subtitles.english: In your field of vision, I am...

subtitles.original: 何の色に見えますか
subtitles.english: What color do I look like to you?

subtitles.original: 張り巡らしたセンサーで
subtitles.english: With my sensors spread all around

subtitles.original: 理由もなく好きになった
subtitles.english: I fell in love with you for no reason

subtitles.original: 涙 お届けするから
subtitles.english: Because I'll deliver tears to you

subtitles.original: 衣装を纏い 待っていて
subtitles.english: Wear your costume and wait

subtitles.original: 風を切るまで
subtitles.english: Until I cut through the wind

subtitles.original: 触れた顔に 触れることができたらいいのにな
subtitles.english: If only I could touch the face I've touched

subtitles.original: あたしの色は誰かの言葉 受け取るために花を咲かせるの
subtitles.english: My color makes flowers bloom to receive someone's words

subtitles.original: 涙枯れたら 無限級数
subtitles.english: When tears dry up, it's an infinite series

subtitles.original: 僕は目を開いて
subtitles.english: I open my eyes

subtitles.original: 口を明け
subtitles.english: And my mouth

subtitles.original: 息をしないで
subtitles.english: Without breathing

subtitles.original: 色を呑む
subtitles.english: I swallow the color

subtitles.original: 君は僕から何が見える？
subtitles.english: What can you see from me?

subtitles.original: って想像する心が欲しかった
subtitles.english: I wanted a heart that imagines that

subtitles.original: 声を枯らすことのないように
subtitles.english: So as not to lose my voice

subtitles.original: 僕にずっと色を注ぎ足してね
subtitles.english: Keep adding colors to me forever

subtitles.original: 君の視界の僕は
subtitles.english: In your field of vision, I am...

subtitles.original: 君の世界の僕を
subtitles.english: How do you paint the me

subtitles.original: どんな色に塗りますか
subtitles.english: In your world?

subtitles.original: 季節に攫われるまでは
subtitles.english: Until I'm carried away by the seasons

subtitles.original: 理由もなく手を
subtitles.english: Without a reason, my hand...

subtitles.original: 涙を知りたいから
subtitles.english: Because I want to know tears

subtitles.original: 衣装を纏う 五感をくれ
subtitles.english: I'll wear a costume, give me five senses

subtitles.original: 側にいるほど 映る僕で
subtitles.english: With the me reflected as much as I'm by your side

subtitles.original: 飾ることができたらいいのにな
subtitles.english: If only I could decorate myself

subtitles.original: 湿っぽい季節の デコレーション グラデーション
subtitles.english: Damp seasonal decorations, gradation

subtitles.original: 咲かせるための依存関係
subtitles.english: A codependency for making things bloom

subtitles.original: 残しておいた余白で
subtitles.english: With the margins I left behind

subtitles.original: 君の感覚を奪う
subtitles.english: I'll steal your senses

subtitles.original: 生の本音はえぐいから
subtitles.english: Since raw true feelings are harsh

subtitles.original: ちゃんと火を通してから食べてね
subtitles.english: Please eat them after they're properly cooked

subtitles.original: 嘘サービスはズルいから
subtitles.english: Since fake services are unfair

subtitles.original: それも維新のレシピ
subtitles.english: That's also a recipe for restoration

subtitles.original: みんな自分奪い合い
subtitles.english: Is everyone scrambling for themselves?

subtitles.original: 嘘の晩餐会
subtitles.english: A banquet of lies

subtitles.original: みんな自分奪い合い
subtitles.english: Is everyone scrambling for themselves?

subtitles.original: 痛みを手懐けて
subtitles.english: Taming the pain

subtitles.original: さあ 嫌いだけど好き 苦くても美味しい
subtitles.english: Now, I hate it but I like it, it's bitter but delicious

subtitles.original: 着ぐるみを着て隠してあげる
subtitles.english: I'll hide it for you by wearing a costume

subtitles.original: 泣かせないように 怒らせないように
subtitles.english: So as not to make you cry or angry

subtitles.original: ちょうどよく君と遊びたいのだ
subtitles.english: I just want to play with you perfectly

subtitles.original: 猫かぶりの猫かぶりな
subtitles.english: Neko kaburi, neko kaburi

subtitles.original: ちょっと臆病な君が好き
subtitles.english: I like you who's a bit cowardly

subtitles.original: 猫かぶりの猫かぶりな
subtitles.english: Neko kaburi, neko kaburi

subtitles.original: 取り繕ってる僕が好き
subtitles.english: I like me when I'm keeping up appearances

subtitles.original: 装ってる君が好きだよ
subtitles.english: I like you when you're pretending

subtitles.original: 表と裏では大違い
subtitles.english: There's a big difference between front and back

subtitles.original: 建前も本音も領地次第
subtitles.english: Public stance and true feelings depend on the territory

subtitles.original: みんな自分を疑っているかい
subtitles.english: Is everyone doubting themselves?

subtitles.original: 独りぼっちの音楽隊
subtitles.english: A lonely band

subtitles.original: みんな自分を疑っているかい
subtitles.english: Is everyone doubting themselves?

subtitles.original: 首輪の鈴鳴らして
subtitles.english: Ring the bell on your collar

subtitles.original: あー 災難だけどハッピー しんどくても平気
subtitles.english: Ah, it's a disaster but happy, I'm fine even if it's tough

subtitles.original: あべこべな夢を見せてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll show you an upside-down dream

subtitles.original: 傷つけないように 追い詰めないように
subtitles.english: So as not to hurt or corner you

subtitles.original: 夜明けまで君とふざけあうのだ
subtitles.english: I'll mess around with you until dawn

subtitles.original: 猫かぶりの猫かぶりな
subtitles.english: Neko kaburi, neko kaburi

subtitles.original: 爪を丸めてる君が好き
subtitles.english: I like you with your claws rounded

subtitles.original: 猫かぶりの猫かぶりな
subtitles.english: Neko kaburi, neko kaburi

subtitles.original: 涙を見せない僕が好き
subtitles.english: I like me when I don't show tears

subtitles.original: 痛みを知ってる君が好きだよ
subtitles.english: I like you who knows pain

subtitles.original: もぐもぐ〜おかゆ〜！
subtitles.english: Mogu mogu~ Okayu~!

subtitles.original: みんな、今日は来てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Everyone, thank you for coming today!

subtitles.original: ここからのね、『君は猫猫、パスなら好きの猫』の部分は、みんなにも一緒に歌ってほしいなと思って。
subtitles.english: For the next part, "Kimi wa neko neko, pasu nara suki no neko," I want you all to sing along with me.

subtitles.original: いい？『君は猫猫』って大きい声で歌うんだよ。
subtitles.english: Okay? Sing "Kimi wa neko neko" in a loud voice.

subtitles.original: 行くよ？
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: せーの！
subtitles.english: One, two!

subtitles.original: 君は猫、猫...
subtitles.english: You are a cat, cat...
